== Video Overview ==

This video shows the user where to find help and information about using Ubuntu.  It takes a tour of the Ubuntu Help Centre accessible through the panel menu.  It demonstrates the use of such sites as ubuntuforums.org and ubuntuguide.org.  It also shows how to find information in the built-in Ubuntu Documentation pages. 

== Target Audience ==

This video is useful for users of Ubuntu who have questions, but do not know how to find the answers.  It introduces those users to the wealth of documentation and support forums available whenever they need it.

== Pre-requisites ==

None.

== Required Knowledge ==

None.

== Recommended Knowledge ==

None.

== Objectives ==

This video aims to be an overview of the numerous support channels available to Ubuntu users.  The goal of this demonstration is to empower new users with the skills necessary to find the answers they are looking for.  It also encourages those users to gain membership at various support forums so as to be able to assist others in turn.
